sources.title: Thug Love | Full Romantic Drama Movie
sources.description:
**This film is under non-exclusive license from MVD Entertainment Group. All rights received** 

Thug Love - She had the perfect life...she wanted more. A divorcee has a fling with a thuggish and well-muscled younger guy, leading to all kinds of havoc in her personal and professional life.

2021
Stars: Millena Gay, Robert G. Brewer, Tabitha Brown

Welcome to Movie Central. Subscribe and watch more Awesome Movies.

metadata.Plot: Destiny is a 40-something advertising exec going through a difficult divorce from her arrogant husband. When she meets Troy, a handsome, streetwise artist half her age, she falls into a passionate affair that awakens her sensual nature. As her obsession grows, her career is endangered. Can she handle the conflict and have it all?
metadata.Actors: Millena Gay, Robert G. Brewer, Tabitha Brown
